Reviews.Title: Great security DVR
Reviews.Author: ABN Ortiz
Reviews.Content: This is my second one. I loved the first one so much, that when I ran into this one, I bought it! This is an easy surveillance system to run. And it has helped me get rid of my neighbor abusive stepkids. They started to invite dope smokers and when they thought I was surveilling them they split! I had my first one for two and a half years and my second one my back up, which may go into service this summer. Everything is so easy on it one two three.

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced H.264 Video Compression
CIF Real-Time Recording (30FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 120FPS Total) / D1 Recording Option (7.5FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 30FPS Total)
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote PC, iPhone, iPad, Blackberry Curve 8900, Bold 9000-9700 only, and other Supported Smartphone Running Windows Mobile Pro or Symbian on 3G Networks. Trigger Email Alerts on Motion Detection Events
Backup important video from the DVR to a PC or Flash Drive
Pre-Installed 320GB Hard Drive
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QR414-320 4-Channel H.264 Real-Time Surveillance DVR Pre-Installed 320 GB Hard Drive
